page.description: Fires when the control's Client-side data source has been refreshed.

description.p: An object with the following properties:

property.name: controlName
property.description: The control whose data has been refreshed.

discussion.p: Several control types (SpinList, ButtonList, Slider) can be populated from data in the Client-side data cache. The *[ui:afterControlBasedOnClientSideDataCacheRefreshed]* event fires after a control that is populated from the Client-side data cache has been populated.
